channel.title: 5 Years/4 Years, 365 Days
channel.description:
Well, in 5 years (My time, 11:22), the magnetic poles will switch for those who don't know. We won't die, but electrons won't power things (I think), and satellites especially won't work. I believe we're taking a new course (Earth), I think in our galaxy. I'm going by what I heard.
So in 5 years (Or 4 years and 365 days [not counting leap year] for your time), life will be changed a lot. Do what you want that won't be there then!
~Lin

item.title: 5 Years/4 Years, 365 Days
item.dc:creator: @_J_O_H_N [-J O H N-]
item.description:
@_J_O_H_N wrote:

sebastianm10:

We always have backup… No worries

Rofl Seb, I always got my backup packs but not enough. I got Coal under my house too. All i gotta do it dig it up

Speljohan:

If this is true, it’s great. I think the human being needs to go back to their roots, no computers, no transportation, nothing. No need to worry/care about people from other places on earth, just care about your own little society. This is a huge improvement to the world.

To your post i would agree but no video games, Tv, I wouldnt have friends because i live in a 5 people neighborhood because my parents like the country and like it to be quiet… My dad would commit suicide my mom would have no reason to go to work and sleep all day… Un-balance in the world of my house! I could still look forward to school then though lol. Teachers would be pissed bout not being able to turn lights on or they’d have to river wash there clothes. Rofl.

Read full topic

item.description:

xxlegitxx:

Bang Train, I’d like to let you know that magnetism and electricity are one entity known as electromagnetism. The presence of magnetism implies electricty, and vice versa.

ya, electronics do create magnetic fields. but that the poles switching doesnt mean batteries are all of a sudden stop working.

item.title: 5 Years/4 Years, 365 Days
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

electronics not work?!
HAHAHAHA

electrons flow from higher concentrations to lower concentrations

thats not magnetism…its more like diffusion of electrons (is there a special name for this)

annnyway…

the poles have switched loads of times in the earths life (and thats like what, a few billion years or something)

the evidence is the ocean floor. when new ocean floor is created (if you dont know this ur an idiot) the magnetism slightly magnetizes the rocks due to iron and other metals in it. This creates banding of N S N S N S rocks with that magnetic field.

Read full topic

item.title: 5 Years/4 Years, 365 Days
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Yeah… whats your point? Thats during a flip it pops up places.

PS: If you know what a aurora is then, we will see those every where not just at the north and south poles. Since more raditation is coming into the atmosphere and building up in one spot. (That is how an aurora is formed.)

Read full topic

item.title: 5 Years/4 Years, 365 Days
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

bryanc:

The field will come back and start blocking the solar radiation again, but compasses will be pointing you south on a map now instead of north

http://science.nasa.gov/headlines/y2003/29dec_magneticfield.htm

Magnetic lines of force near Earth's surface become twisted and tangled, and magnetic poles pop up in unaccustomed places. A south magnetic pole might emerge over Africa, for instance, or a north pole over Tahiti. Weird. But it's still a planetary magnetic field, and it still protects us from space radiation and solar storms.

Read full topic

item.title: 5 Years/4 Years, 365 Days
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

thanks xxlegit. At least someone has searched the web or has been to Earth Science class.

I mean everyone knows that the magnetic field flips, but it does not happen frequently.

And when it DOES flip again, nothing will happen to energy… nothing will happen to technology, just there will be higher numbers of radiation since the field isn’t there to block it. Meaning more people will die of cancer.

Goto Earth Science class, and you can learn this.

EDIT:

The field will come back and start blocking the solar radiation again, but compasses will be pointing you south on a map now instead of north

EDIT 2:

There are plenty of sources of information for this on google. Plus images of data and the field flipping.

Thats the magnetic field flip, and right now the field is “flowing” out of the south pole and going around the earth into the north pole backl to the core and back to the south pole. Creating a loop. This blocks most of the solar radiation from the suns “burps”

Read full topic

item.title: 5 Years/4 Years, 365 Days
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:51, topic:166696”][quote author=lawl link=topic=225946.msg1949692#msg1949692 date=1198463608]
the last time it happened was a long time ago, there were probably no birds anyway, its the sun that swaps every 10 years, not the earth

12/21/12
[/quote]

Haha, no.

The earth’s outer core’s rotation is what causes the magnetic field, and it’s turbulence causes the magnetic poles to swap.

The last time it happened was 780,000 years ago, and birds were definitely around.[/quote]Finally someone that is actually right -.-

Read full topic

item.title: 5 Years/4 Years, 365 Days

[quote=“lawl, post:1, topic:167302”]the last time it happened was a long time ago, there were probably no birds anyway, its the sun that swaps every 10 years, not the earth

12/21/12[/quote]

Haha, no.

The earth’s outer core’s rotation is what causes the magnetic field, and it’s turbulence causes the magnetic poles to swap.

The last time it happened was 780,000 years ago, and birds were definitely around.
